ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Gordon
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh!  When I realized how poorly I had done my stats, I took everything out of the bank, bagged up all of my armor, handed it all to a friend, deleted my
ygData.messageBody:
Heh! When I realized how poorly I had done my stats, I took everything out
of the bank, bagged up all of my armor, handed it all to a friend, deleted
my character, then re-made him (guildtag/naming restrictions, or else I
would have just made another bard). He was 31 ;o)~

-=B=-
Barrd Talespinner
Almost 34 on The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: Webber, Jessica <webber@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 12:55 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Gordon


> I think your right. I believe it's for memorizing songs. I may have been
> suckered into throwing points into that too. And I probably also threw
some
> into dexterity for our rogue-like abilities.
>
> I see a survey of base stats on the horizon...
>
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
